Name: Windows Scheduled Task - Create
Description: Create Windows scheduled task. If the task exists it will be torn down and re-added to ensure consistency

Parameters.Name: TaskName
Parameters.Label: Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the Scheduled Task

Parameters.Name: RunAsUser
Parameters.Label: User
Parameters.HelpText: The User that the task will run as

Parameters.Name: Command
Parameters.Label: Action
Parameters.HelpText: The Action that the task executes. Usually a path to the executable

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
MINUTE|Every Minute
HOURLY|Hourly
DAILY|Daily.
WEEKLY|Weekly
ONCE|One off
ONSTART|On Start
ONLOGON|On Logon
ONIDLE|On Idle
MONTHLY|Monthly

Parameters.Name: StartTime
Parameters.Label: Start Time
Parameters.HelpText: The Time the task will run. Use the format HH:mm:ss

Parameters.Name: StartDate
Parameters.Label: Start Date
Parameters.HelpText: The date the task will start running. use the format dd-MM-yyyy

Parameters.Name: Interval
Parameters.Label: Interval
Parameters.HelpText: A value that specifies the repetition interval in minutes.

Parameters.Name: Duration
Parameters.Label: Duration
Parameters.HelpText: A value that specifies the duration to run the task. The time format is HH:mm (24-hour time).

Parameters.Name: Arguments
Parameters.Label: Arguments
Parameters.HelpText: Any command-line arguments you need to pass to the task
